Deutsch: ach so, aha, oh (Ausruf, Ausdruck des Erkennens, plötzliches Verstehen)  (Int)
ach so, aha, oh (Ausruf, Ausdruck des Erkennens, plötzliches Verstehen)  (Int)
English: oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy
may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
